Text: Our Man In Havana (1958) is a novel set in Cuba by the British author Graham Greene.
Triplets:<Our Man In Havana

--------------------
Text: Our Man in Havana:  The book predates the Cuban Missile Crisis, but certain aspects of the plot, notably the role of missile installations, appear to anticipate the events of 1962.
